This 1Pc 20mm Camper Car Half-moon Push Lock is a versatile and durable locking mechanism designed for various applications. Its compact size and robust construction make it ideal for use in RVs, caravans, boats, motor homes, cabinets, drawers, furniture doors, and more.

  • Half-moon Shape: Provides a distinctive aesthetic appeal while ensuring secure locking.
  • Push-button Operation: Simple and convenient to engage and release the lock with a quick push.
  • Durable Construction: Made from high-quality materials for long-lasting performance.
  • 20mm Size: Suitable for applications requiring a compact locking solution.

This lock features a 20mm diameter and is designed for use with corresponding latch receivers. The exact material composition and weight may vary depending on the manufacturer.

By incorporating this camper car half-moon push lock into your projects, you can enjoy several benefits:

  • Enhanced Security: Prevent unauthorized access to valuable items stored in cabinets, drawers, and compartments.
  • Easy Operation: The push-button mechanism allows for quick and effortless locking and unlocking.
  • Aesthetic Appeal: Its half-moon design adds a touch of style to your RV, caravan, or furniture pieces.

This versatile lock is suitable for a wide range of applications. It can be used to secure cabinets, drawers, doors, hatches, and other openings on:

  • RVs and Caravans
  • Boats
  • Motor Homes
  • Furniture
  • Cabinets and Drawers
